page.title: 08CONTINUED
page.content: 5)A middle aged lady told us that if there were any more shops it would spoil the village. The woman has lived in Smalley 25 years. Another old man told us he had been living in Smalley 79 years. He said that there are not as many vandals as there used to be, people seem to be more responsible now. 7)A young girl who had lived in Smalley 2 years said that she wished the main road was not there. 8)In the garage the young lad said that there are not many trouble-makers about. He sells 20 cans of petrol/oil and he repairs about 20 cars a week. 9)In the Nags Head Public House the landlord told us that he got quite alot of custom in the pub from the village and the area around.
